features: LEAVE YOU CLEAN AND FRESH. Summerâs Eve Fresh Scent Douche will leave you feeling clean and fresh.

body.description: (Pack of 4 Bottles) Summer's Eve Fresh Scent Douche Vinegar & Water, Feminine Wash, 4.5oz Bottles. PH Balanced, Naturally Inspired, & Gynecologist Tested (Pack of 4 Bottles, 4.5oz Each Bottle) - Summer’s Eve Douche will leave you feeling clean and fresh. The mild, yet effective, the pH-balanced formula has been gynecologist tested for gentleness to make sure you’re getting the proper attention you so rightly deserve without irritation. Directions: Remove sanitary overwrap. Hold the bottle cap with one hand and firmly grasp the Comfortip nozzle with the other hand. Pull the nozzle straight up until it clicks in place. Douche is not ready for use until you hear this click. Gently insert the nozzle into your vagina, no more than 3 inches, and slowly squeeze the bottle. Do not close the vaginal opening; douching solution should flow freely out of the vagina. Use while sitting on the toilet, in the tub, or in the shower.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars 4 Pk Summet Eves
reviews.reviewText: Horrible Packaging, Was In Bag & Not In A Box, Looks Like Some Was Damage But No Leakage

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Product itself is great however mine took quite a while to arrive & when it did it was NOT in the best of condition. Each of the 4 boxes were damaged & inside packaging torn. I then priced them @ the local store (which I should have done before placing my order here, so that's on me) only to find, the prices here were quite a bit higher than I would have paid had I just picked them up at the local market or drug store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used this brand for years but this is the first time that the solution would not leave the bottle so I opened another bottle with the same result. Not happy at all

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I haven't used this product in years because it was so harsh. Now that things have changed with my body, once every few weeks I used this and no sting and feel refreshed.
